file_path: c:\Silverdale QA\BPMN XML\Cost Greater than 1000\Repair Order (repair.order)_preprocessed_features.csv

key_findings.finding: "Does it Work?" Check is Strongest Predictor
key_findings.description: 97.5% of liquidated items failed "Does it work?" check. 85.5% of items that passed became sellable.

key_findings.finding: High COGS Items Have Lower Liquidation Rate
key_findings.description: Items >= $2,000 have 26.5% liquidation rate vs 30.0% for lower COGS items
key_findings.impact: Counter-intuitive: Higher value items are handled better

key_findings.finding: Cosmetic Checks Have High False Positive Rate
key_findings.description: 79.6% of items that failed cosmetic checks were still sellable
key_findings.impact: Cosmetic criteria may be too strict

key_findings.description: 7 items that passed "Does it work?" were still liquidated

key_findings.finding: Categories with Very High Liquidation Rates
Functional Issues are Primary Liquidation Reason
key_findings.description: 47.4% of liquidations are due to functional issues

key_findings.finding: Fraud Detection Accounts for Significant Liquidations
key_findings.description: 30.5% of liquidations are due to fraud detection
35 products have mixed outcomes (some liquidate, some sellable)
key_findings.impact: Decision criteria may be inconsistently applied

problems_identified.description: 29.9% of orders are liquidated, which is above optimal threshold
problems_identified.root_cause: Multiple factors: functional issues, fraud detection, cosmetic criteria

problems_identified.description: 7 items that passed "Does it work?" were liquidated
problems_identified.root_cause: Other checks (cosmetic, fraud) overriding functional status
No exception handling for high-value items

problems_identified.description: 79.6% false positive rate for cosmetic checks
problems_identified.root_cause: Cosmetic criteria may be too strict or inconsistently applied

problems_identified.problem: Categories with Very High Liquidation Rates
problems_identified.root_cause: Category-specific quality standards may be inappropriate
Decision criteria inconsistently applied or subjective

problems_identified.description: Average 22.1 checks per order may slow processing
problems_identified.root_cause: Too many checks required, some may be redundant

recommendations.recommendation: Implement Exception Handling for High COGS Items
recommendations.description: Create exception rules for items with COGS >= $2,000 that pass "Does it work?" check
action_items: Modify BPMN to add exception path for high COGS items
Require additional review before liquidating high COGS items
Consider relaxing cosmetic criteria for high COGS working items
recommendations.expected_impact: Could recover $24,335.74 in high COGS items

recommendations.recommendation: Review and Prevent Liquidating Working Items
recommendations.description: Items that pass "Does it work?" should rarely be liquidated
action_items: Audit all working items that were liquidated
Modify BPMN to require additional approval for liquidating working items
Create exception rule: If "Does it work?" = Passed, require Level 3 review before liquidation

recommendations.recommendation: Review and Relax Cosmetic Check Criteria
recommendations.description: Cosmetic checks have 79.6% false positive rate
action_items: Review cosmetic check criteria and thresholds
Consider making cosmetic issues non-blocking for sellable items
Update BPMN to allow cosmetic issues if item works and is repairable
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduce false liquidations due to cosmetic issues

recommendations.recommendation: Create Exception Rules for Products That Always Liquidate
action_items: Investigate why these products always liquidate
Consider if these products should be in repair process at all
Create exception handling or alternative routing for these products
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduce unnecessary processing of products that will always liquidate

action_items: Review quality standards for high-rate categories
Consider if standards are appropriate for these categories
Implement category-specific exception rules if needed
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduce liquidation rate in problematic categories

recommendations.recommendation: Standardize Decision Criteria for Consistent Outcomes
action_items: Review decision criteria for products with mixed outcomes
Create clear guidelines for when to liquidate vs sell
Provide additional training on decision criteria
Implement quality assurance reviews for inconsistent products

recommendations.recommendation: Optimize Check Volume to Reduce Processing Time
recommendations.description: Average 22.1 checks per order may be excessive
action_items: Review all checks for redundancy
Identify checks that rarely affect outcome
Consider removing or combining redundant checks
Prioritize checks that have highest impact on decision
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduce processing time and improve efficiency

recommendations.description: 30.5% of liquidations are due to fraud
action_items: Review fraud detection criteria and accuracy
Audit high COGS items marked as fraud
Consider additional verification for fraud cases
Implement appeal process for fraud decisions
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduce false fraud positives, especially for high COGS items

recommendations.recommendation: Implement Recovery Process for Working Liquidated Items
recommendations.description: Create process to recover working items that were liquidated
action_items: Identify all working items that were liquidated
Create recovery workflow to re-evaluate these items
Implement quality gate before final liquidation decision
Add recovery step in BPMN for working items

recommendations.description: Update BPMN to incorporate exception handling and improved decision logic
action_items: Add exception path for high COGS items (>= $2,000)
Add review gate for working items before liquidation
Modify cosmetic check logic to be non-blocking for working items
Add Level 3 review requirement for high-value liquidations
Implement category-specific routing where appropriate
recommendations.expected_impact: Improve decision quality and reduce unnecessary liquidations

recover_working_items.description: Recover all items that passed "Does it work?" check

high_cogs_exception.description: Implement exception handling for high COGS items (>= $2,000)
